metadata.description: Task library for Odoo implementation projects at Arkode

standard_tasks.name: Project Kickoff Meeting
standard_tasks.description: Initial meeting with stakeholders to align on project scope, timeline, and success criteria

standard_tasks.name: Stakeholder Interviews
standard_tasks.description: Conduct interviews with key stakeholders to understand business requirements and pain points

standard_tasks.name: Current Process Mapping
standard_tasks.description: Document client's current business processes (as-is) across all departments

standard_tasks.name: Gap Analysis Workshop
standard_tasks.description: Identify gaps between current processes and Odoo standard functionality

standard_tasks.name: Future Process Design (To-Be)
standard_tasks.description: Design optimized future-state processes leveraging Odoo best practices

standard_tasks.name: Data Migration Assessment
standard_tasks.description: Evaluate existing data quality, structure, and migration requirements

standard_tasks.name: Integration Requirements Analysis
standard_tasks.description: Identify all third-party systems requiring integration with Odoo

standard_tasks.name: Customization Scoping
standard_tasks.description: Document customizations needed beyond standard Odoo functionality

standard_tasks.name: User Access & Security Design
standard_tasks.description: Define user roles, permissions, and security requirements

standard_tasks.name: Solution Proposal Document
standard_tasks.description: Create comprehensive solution document with process flows and configuration plan

standard_tasks.name: Clarity Phase Review & Sign-off
standard_tasks.description: Present findings and get stakeholder approval to proceed to implementation

standard_tasks.name: Training Material Preparation
standard_tasks.description: Create training guides, videos, and documentation tailored to client's processes

standard_tasks.name: Admin/Super User Training
standard_tasks.description: Train system administrators and super users on system configuration and maintenance

standard_tasks.name: End User Training Sessions
standard_tasks.description: Conduct role-based training sessions for end users by department/module

standard_tasks.name: Go-Live Preparation
standard_tasks.description: Final system checks, cutover planning, and go-live readiness assessment

standard_tasks.name: Go-Live Support (Day 1-3)
standard_tasks.description: Intensive on-site or remote support during first days of live operation

standard_tasks.name: Post Go-Live Support (Week 1-2)
standard_tasks.description: Ongoing support to address questions and issues as users adopt the system

standard_tasks.name: User Adoption Monitoring
standard_tasks.description: Track usage metrics and identify areas needing additional support or training

standard_tasks.name: Knowledge Base Setup
standard_tasks.description: Create internal knowledge base with FAQs, tips, and troubleshooting guides

standard_tasks.name: Hypercare Period Support (Week 3-4)
standard_tasks.description: Extended support period to ensure smooth stabilization of operations

standard_tasks.name: Project Closure & Handover
standard_tasks.description: Final project review, lessons learned, and handover to ongoing support team

CRM.description: Customer Relationship Management module for managing leads, opportunities, and sales pipeline

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Configuration - Pipeline Stages
implementation_tasks.description: Configure pipeline stages for lead and opportunity management (New, Qualified, Proposition, Won, Lost)

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Configuration - Sales Teams
implementation_tasks.description: Set up sales teams, territories, and team members with quotas and targets

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Configuration - Lead Scoring Rules
implementation_tasks.description: Configure AI-assisted lead scoring based on client's qualification criteria

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Configuration - Automated Assignment Rules
implementation_tasks.description: Set up automated lead/opportunity assignment to sales team members

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Configuration - Activities & Next Actions
implementation_tasks.description: Configure activity types (calls, meetings, emails) and automated activity scheduling

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Email Integration
implementation_tasks.description: Integrate email (Gmail/Outlook) for lead capture and communication tracking

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Live Chat Integration
implementation_tasks.description: Set up live chat widget on website for automatic lead generation

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Lost Reasons Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Define lost reasons for opportunities to track why deals are lost

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Tags & Categorization
implementation_tasks.description: Set up tags for lead/opportunity categorization and filtering

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Dashboards & Reports
implementation_tasks.description: Configure CRM dashboards, pipeline analysis, and sales forecasting reports

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Data Migration - Leads & Opportunities
implementation_tasks.description: Import historical leads and opportunities from legacy CRM system

implementation_tasks.name: CRM Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test CRM workflows, automations, and integrations with sample data

Sales.description: Sales Order Management module for quotations, orders, and invoicing

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Configuration - Product Catalog Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure products/services with pricing, descriptions, and categories

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Configuration - Pricelists
implementation_tasks.description: Set up customer-specific pricelists, discounts, and pricing rules

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Configuration - Quotation Templates
implementation_tasks.description: Create reusable quotation templates for common product/service bundles

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Configuration - Terms & Conditions
implementation_tasks.description: Configure default terms and conditions for quotations and sales orders

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Configuration - Payment Terms
implementation_tasks.description: Set up payment terms (Net 30, 50% upfront, etc.) and invoicing policies

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Configuration - Sales Teams & Salespeople
implementation_tasks.description: Configure sales teams and assign salespeople with targets

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Online Quotations & e-Signature
implementation_tasks.description: Enable online quotation portal with electronic signature and payment

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Product Variants Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Set up product variants (size, color, etc.) with attribute-based pricing

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Optional Products & Cross-sell
implementation_tasks.description: Configure optional products and cross-sell suggestions in quotations

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Invoicing Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Configure invoicing policy (on delivery, on order, milestones)

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Delivery Methods & Shipping
implementation_tasks.description: Set up delivery methods, shipping costs, and carrier integration

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Subscription Products (if applicable)
implementation_tasks.description: Configure recurring products and subscription plans

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Reports & Analytics
implementation_tasks.description: Configure sales dashboards, revenue analysis, and performance reports

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Data Migration - Products & Customers
implementation_tasks.description: Import products, customers, and historical sales orders

implementation_tasks.name: Sales Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test quotation-to-order-to-invoice workflow with various scenarios

Purchase.description: Purchase Order Management module for procurement and vendor management

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Configuration - Vendor Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure vendors with contact details, payment terms, and delivery addresses

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Configuration - Product Categories
implementation_tasks.description: Set up product categories for purchased goods with default accounts

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Configuration - Vendor Pricelists
implementation_tasks.description: Configure vendor-specific pricelists and purchase agreements

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Approval Workflow
implementation_tasks.description: Set up multi-level approval workflow for purchase orders based on amount thresholds

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Requisition Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Configure purchase requisitions (calls for tenders) for competitive bidding

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Configuration - Reordering Rules
implementation_tasks.description: Set up automated reordering rules to generate purchase orders when stock is low

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Dropshipping Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Configure dropshipping workflow where vendors ship directly to customers

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase 3-Way Matching Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Enable 3-way matching (PO, Receipt, Vendor Bill) for invoice validation

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Vendor Bill Digitization (OCR)
implementation_tasks.description: Configure OCR for automatic vendor bill scanning and data extraction

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Reports & Analytics
implementation_tasks.description: Configure purchase analysis, vendor performance, and spend reports

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Data Migration - Vendors & Products
implementation_tasks.description: Import vendor master data and purchasable product catalog

implementation_tasks.name: Purchase Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test purchase requisition to PO to receipt to vendor bill workflow

Inventory.description: Inventory & Warehouse Management module for stock control and logistics

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Configuration - Warehouse Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure warehouse(s) with locations, routes, and operational flows

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Configuration - Locations & Storage
implementation_tasks.description: Set up storage locations hierarchy (zones, aisles, shelves, bins)

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Multi-Step Routes Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Configure multi-step receipt (1/2/3-step) and delivery flows

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Lot & Serial Number Tracking
implementation_tasks.description: Enable and configure lot/serial number tracking for traceability (enhanced in v19)

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Barcode Scanning Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure barcode app for mobile picking, packing, and inventory adjustments (reworked in v19)

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Reordering Rules & Automated Replenishment
implementation_tasks.description: Set up min/max reordering rules for automated stock replenishment

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Batch Transfers Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Configure batch picking and transfer operations for warehouse efficiency

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Cycle Counting Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure cycle counting during operations for continuous inventory accuracy

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Valuation Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Set up inventory valuation methods (FIFO, AVCO) and automated accounting entries

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Product Categories & UoM
implementation_tasks.description: Configure product categories, units of measure, and conversions

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Delivery Methods & Shipping
implementation_tasks.description: Set up delivery carriers and shipping integration (UPS, FedEx, etc.)

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Scrap & Quality Control
implementation_tasks.description: Configure scrap management and quality control checkpoints

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Reports & Dashboards
implementation_tasks.description: Configure inventory valuation, stock movement, and warehouse performance reports

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Data Migration - Opening Stock
implementation_tasks.description: Import opening stock balances by location and product

implementation_tasks.name: Inventory Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test full warehouse workflows including receipts, transfers, deliveries, and adjustments

Manufacturing.description: Manufacturing module for production planning and shop floor management

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Configuration - Bill of Materials (BoM)
implementation_tasks.description: Create bills of materials for all manufactured products with components and quantities
implementation_tasks.odoo_feature: Manufacturing > Master Data > Bills of Materials

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Configuration - Work Centers
implementation_tasks.description: Set up work centers (machines, stations) with capacity and efficiency rates

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Configuration - Routing & Operations
implementation_tasks.description: Configure manufacturing routings with operations sequence and work center assignments

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing MTO/MTS Strategy
implementation_tasks.description: Configure make-to-order (MTO) vs make-to-stock (MTS) manufacturing strategies

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Byproducts Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Set up byproducts and co-products in manufacturing processes

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Quality Control Points
implementation_tasks.description: Configure quality control checkpoints during production operations

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Work Order Tablet View
implementation_tasks.description: Configure shop floor tablet interface for work order execution

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Subcontracting Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure subcontracting workflows for outsourced manufacturing operations

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Planning & Scheduling
implementation_tasks.description: Set up master production schedule and capacity planning

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Maintenance Management
implementation_tasks.description: Configure preventive maintenance schedules for equipment and work centers

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Cost Structure
implementation_tasks.description: Configure manufacturing cost tracking (materials, labor, overhead)

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Reports & Analytics
implementation_tasks.description: Configure production analysis, efficiency reports, and work center performance

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Data Migration - BoMs & Work Centers
implementation_tasks.description: Import bills of materials, routings, and work center master data

implementation_tasks.name: Manufacturing Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test complete manufacturing cycle from MO creation to finished goods

Projects.description: Project Management module for task planning and time tracking

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Configuration - Project Templates
implementation_tasks.description: Create reusable project templates for common project types

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Configuration - Task Stages
implementation_tasks.description: Configure task stages (New, In Progress, Done, etc.) by project type

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Configuration - Milestones
implementation_tasks.description: Enable and configure project milestones for deliverable tracking

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Timesheet Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Set up timesheet tracking and integration with payroll/invoicing

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Task Dependencies
implementation_tasks.description: Configure task dependencies and critical path tracking

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Billable Projects Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure billable projects with time & materials or fixed price billing

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Resource Planning
implementation_tasks.description: Set up resource allocation and planning view for team capacity

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Task Automation
implementation_tasks.description: Configure automated actions for task assignment and status updates

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Customer Portal
implementation_tasks.description: Configure customer portal access for project visibility and collaboration

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Reports & Analytics
implementation_tasks.description: Configure project performance, time analysis, and profitability reports

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Data Migration - Projects & Tasks
implementation_tasks.description: Import historical projects and tasks from legacy project management tools

implementation_tasks.name: Projects Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test project workflows including task creation, timesheets, and billing

Expenses.description: Employee Expense Management module for expense reporting and reimbursement

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Configuration - Expense Categories
implementation_tasks.description: Set up expense categories (travel, meals, accommodation, etc.) with GL accounts

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Approval Workflow
implementation_tasks.description: Configure multi-level approval workflow for expense reports

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses OCR Receipt Scanning
implementation_tasks.description: Enable OCR for automatic receipt scanning and expense data extraction

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Company Policies
implementation_tasks.description: Configure company expense policies and spending limits by category

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Mileage Tracking
implementation_tasks.description: Set up mileage expense tracking with reimbursement rates

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Payment Integration
implementation_tasks.description: Configure expense payment processing and bank account integration

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Project/Analytic Allocation
implementation_tasks.description: Set up project and cost center allocation for expense tracking

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Reports & Analytics
implementation_tasks.description: Configure expense analysis and spending reports by category/employee/project

implementation_tasks.name: Expenses Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test expense submission, approval, and reimbursement workflows

Approvals.description: Approval Requests module for workflow approvals across business processes

implementation_tasks.name: Approvals Configuration - Approval Categories
implementation_tasks.description: Create approval categories (time off, business trips, purchases, etc.)

implementation_tasks.name: Approvals Workflow Design
implementation_tasks.description: Configure multi-level approval workflows and routing rules

implementation_tasks.name: Approvals Email Notifications
implementation_tasks.description: Set up automated email notifications for pending approvals and decisions

implementation_tasks.name: Approvals Integration with Other Modules
implementation_tasks.description: Integrate approval workflows with Purchase, Expenses, HR, and other modules

implementation_tasks.name: Approvals Reports & Analytics
implementation_tasks.description: Configure approval cycle time and bottleneck analysis reports

implementation_tasks.name: Approvals Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test approval request submission, routing, and decision workflows

Accounting.description: Accounting & Finance module for financial management and reporting

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Configuration - Chart of Accounts
implementation_tasks.description: Configure or import chart of accounts based on local accounting standards

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Configuration - Fiscal Year & Periods
implementation_tasks.description: Set up fiscal year, accounting periods, and lock dates

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Configuration - Journals
implementation_tasks.description: Configure accounting journals (sales, purchase, bank, cash, misc)

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Configuration - Taxes
implementation_tasks.description: Set up tax codes, rates, and tax reporting based on local regulations

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Bank Feed Integration
implementation_tasks.description: Connect bank accounts for automatic transaction import and reconciliation (enhanced in v19)

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Bank Reconciliation Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure AI-powered bank reconciliation with matching rules (enhanced in v19)

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Payment Terms & Methods
implementation_tasks.description: Configure payment terms, methods, and follow-up procedures

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Customer/Vendor Payment Acquirers
implementation_tasks.description: Set up online payment processing (Stripe, PayPal, etc.) for customer invoices

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Analytic Accounts & Cost Centers
implementation_tasks.description: Configure analytic accounts for project/department cost tracking

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Multi-Currency Setup
implementation_tasks.description: Configure multi-currency support with exchange rates and gain/loss accounts

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Multi-Company Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Set up multi-company accounting with inter-company transactions

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Fixed Assets Management
implementation_tasks.description: Configure fixed asset tracking and depreciation schedules

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Invoice Automation & OCR
implementation_tasks.description: Enable OCR for vendor bill scanning and automated invoice processing

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Follow-up & Collections
implementation_tasks.description: Configure automated payment reminders and collections workflow (WhatsApp in v19)

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting ISO20022 Compliance
implementation_tasks.description: Configure ISO20022 banking standards for international payments (v19 feature)

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Withholding Tax Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Set up withholding tax for cross-border payments (enhanced in v19)

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Financial Reports
implementation_tasks.description: Configure unified financial reports (Balance Sheet, P&L, Trial Balance) - v19 enhancement

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Budget Management
implementation_tasks.description: Set up budget planning and variance analysis

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Data Migration - Opening Balances
implementation_tasks.description: Import opening balances for customers, vendors, and GL accounts

implementation_tasks.name: Accounting Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test complete accounting cycle including invoicing, payments, and reconciliation

FSM.description: Field Service Management module for on-site service operations

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Configuration - Service Teams
implementation_tasks.description: Set up field service teams and technician assignments

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Configuration - Service Products
implementation_tasks.description: Configure service products and parts catalog for field operations

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Worksheet Templates
implementation_tasks.description: Create customizable worksheet templates for field service tasks

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Mobile App Configuration
implementation_tasks.description: Configure mobile field service app for technicians

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Equipment & Asset Tracking
implementation_tasks.description: Set up customer equipment/asset tracking for maintenance scheduling

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Scheduling & Dispatching
implementation_tasks.description: Configure task scheduling, route optimization, and technician dispatching

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Time & Materials Billing
implementation_tasks.description: Set up billable field service with time tracking and material consumption

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Customer Portal
implementation_tasks.description: Configure customer portal for service request submission and tracking

implementation_tasks.name: FSM GPS & Location Tracking
implementation_tasks.description: Enable GPS tracking for technician location and travel time

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Reports & Analytics
implementation_tasks.description: Configure field service performance, SLA tracking, and technician productivity reports

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Data Migration - Customer Equipment
implementation_tasks.description: Import customer asset/equipment database and service history

implementation_tasks.name: FSM Testing & Validation
implementation_tasks.description: Test complete field service workflow from task creation to invoicing
